summary_one_paragraph: On October 5, 1967, Milton K. Durrett submitted an agent report detailing the findings of a field 201 file check on Roman Davor Srecko Arnold, a Specialist Four in the 49th Signal Platoon at Fort Hood, Texas, concerning a 'possible sensitive desertion.' The report, extracted from Arnold's 201 file, includes his personal details such as birth date (January 6, 1945, in Lindau Bodensee, Germany), citizenship (German), marital status (single), and religious preference (Roman Catholic). It also covers his military service history from October 1965 to the present, noting various assignments and promotions, as well as aptitude test scores and physical characteristics; the report highlights the absence of a DD Form 398 which limited the available information.
